snippet.title: Age of Defense TD - Mission 10 Madness Mode
snippet.description:
Age of Defense is a classic Tower Defense game set in prehistoric times. It boasts a charming cartoon art style and introduces numerous new gameplay features.
 
The game offers three modes: Story, Challenge, and Madness. Among them, Madness mode stands out as the most challenging. Each level in this mode features enemies from all five worlds, and there are intriguing map features to discover. For instance, Mission 10 in Madness Mode is designed like a conveyor, where enemies move from one path to another once they reach the end.
 
This particular mission is one of the highlights of the game, both in terms of gameplay and visual appeal. It truly captures a fantastic atmosphere. What are your thoughts on it?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/603320/Age_of_Defense/
